seriesJson.title: Tales of the valiant
seriesJson.description: Dramatic stories of great national heroes outside the English-speaking world.

node.title: Jose de San Martin
node.description: Jose de San Martin, hero of Argentina, crosses the Andes in the War of Liberation.

node.title: Giuseppe Garibaldi
node.description: Giuseppe Garibaldi, hero of Italy, valiantly leads his Red Shirts to victory in Sicily.

node.title: Audition sampler
node.description: This program features a sampling of episodes from the series for audition purposes.

subject.name: Saladin, Sultan of Egypt and Syria, 1137-1193.

node.title: Jose Rizel
node.description: Jose Rizal, hero of the Philippines, sets the theme of Philippine independence and is martyred by the Spaniards.

node.title: El Cid
node.description: El Cid, hero of Spain, campaigns against the Moors and Spanish intrigue to prove his loyalty to the throne.

node.title: Kusunoki Masashige
node.description: Kusunoki Masashige, hero of Japan, prototype of loyalty and military skill, destroys the Hojo armies and sets the true Emperor upon the throne.

node.title: Saladin
node.description: Saladin, hero of Islam and the Arab states, throws the Frankish invaders from the Holy Land.

subject.name: Saladin, Sultan of Egypt and Syria, 1137-1193.

node.title: Kemal Ataturk
node.description: Kemal Ataturk, hero of Turkey, establishes the Turkish Republic.

node.title: Kou Ch'ien
node.description: Kou Ch'ien, hero of Free China, persevers over adversity and intrigue to reconquer the Kingdom of Yueh.

node.title: Chevalier Bayard
node.description: Chevalier Bayard, hero of France, last Knight of the Middle Ages, leads the valiant defense of Mezieres.

subject.name: Bayard, Pierre Terrail, seigneur de, approximately 1473-1524

node.title: Charles XII
node.description: Charles XII, hero of Sweden, attempts to dethrone the Tsar at Poltava.

node.title: William of Orange
node.description: William of Orange, hero of Holland, leads the independence movement in the Low Countries.

node.title: Cuauhtemoc
node.description: Cuauhtemoc, hero of Mexico, last Lord of the Aztecs, defends Mexico City against Corte_s.

node.title: Darius the Great
node.description: Darius the Great, Emperor of ancient Persia and hero of Iran, wins over the Khan of the Bahktiari to forge the first world empire.

subject.name: Darius I, King of Persia, 548 B.C.-485 B.C.
